solution_line_template: When Katherine is {num_dozen} dozen years old, she will be {num_dozen}*{dozen}=<<{num_dozen}*{dozen}={katherine_age}>>{katherine_age} years old.

If Mel is three years younger than Katherine, then when Katherine is {katherine_age} years old, Mel will be {katherine_age}-{mel_younger}=<<{katherine_age}-{mel_younger}={mel_age}>>{mel_age} years old.
